remarks: Two atoms covering the zero subspace are equal.  ( ~ atcv1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 29-Nov-2011.)
statement:
atcvrj0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atcvrj0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atcvrj0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atcvrj0.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvrj0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvrj0 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. B /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ X C ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> ( X = .0. <-> P = Q ) ) $.
